paragraphs.text: %md # THIS NOTEBOOK DEPENDS ON RESULTS FROM PREVIOUS NOTEBOOK

result.msg: THIS NOTEBOOK DEPENDS ON RESULTS FROM PREVIOUS NOTEBOOK

paragraphs.title: Show the enriched ItemFactors from the previous notebook
Convert into format needed by kMeans Cluster Algorithm
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors

val enrichedDenseVectorItemFactorsDF = enrichedItemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"title", $"tags", $"itemFactors", $"img").map(row => 
  (row.getLong(0), row.getString(1), row.getSeq[String](2), Vectors.dense(row.getSeq[Double](3).toArray), row.getString(4))
).toDF("itemId", "title", "tags", "itemFactors", "img")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)

z.show(enrichedDenseVectorItemFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Train K-Means Cluster Model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans

val kmeans = new KMeans()
  .setK(5)
  .setMaxIter(10)
  .setFeaturesCol("itemFactors")
  .setPredictionCol("clusterId")

val kmeansModel = kmeans.fit(enrichedDenseVectorItemFactorsDF)

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans
kmeans: org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeans = kmeans_4f3e80083239
kmeansModel: org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeansModel = kmeans_4f3e80083239

paragraphs.title: Evaluate K-Means Cluster Model Using Within Set Sum of Squared Errors (WSSSE)
paragraphs.text:
val WSSSE = kmeansModel.computeCost(enrichedDenseVectorItemFactorsDF)

println("Within Set Sum of Squared Errors = " + WSSSE)

result.msg:
WSSSE: Double = 1.816228488954153
Within Set Sum of Squared Errors = 1.816228488954153

name: Live Recs/05: Item-to-Item Collab Filtering Cluster Recs (ALS + K-Means)
